EmailTemplate.description: Email to Proivder for case creation acknowledgement for demographic change request
EmailTemplate.name: BCBS Texas
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of Texas Demographic Change Request Form Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.Name_Submitter__c},
Thank you for contacting Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Texas.
This email is confirmation we have received your request, case number {!Case.CaseNumber}, for {!Case.Name_of_Provider_Group__c}.
Your request may take up to 30 days to complete. Once completed, a notification will be sent to the email address submitted with the Demographic Change Request Form.
To check the status of your case, please click on status checker({!$Setup.UtilitySettings_Hierarchy__c.CaseStatusUrl__c}) or for any questions, contact 1-877-229-0719.
Sincerely, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Texas
Powered by: SalesforceTM
Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Texas, a Division of Health Care Service Corporation, a Mutual Legal Reserve Company, an Independent Licensee of the Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association.
Â© 2017 Health Care Service Corporation. All rights reserved.
(NOTE: Please do not remove the Ref id) Ref id {!Case.Thread_Id}
